features: EYE PROTECTION LCD WRITING TABLET: Adopts 2022 LCD pressure-sensitive technology and 10-inch LCD colorful screen. This toddler doodle board toys without radiation, no glare, safe and comfortable even use for a long time.

ENVIRONMENTAL: The battery of the writing and drawing tablet has 3-6 months battery life, can be replaced for cycle use, without charging or plugging in power. The drawing pad toys can provide about 100,000 writings, avoid waste of paper and pencils

ABSOLUTELY SAFETY TOYS FOR KIDS -- The battery compartment is secured with a screw. Our toddlers are not easy access button battery. Safety for kids. There may be scratches on the screen when opening the package, which is caused by transportation, just press the erase button and the screen will be clear
EDUCATIONAL LEARNING TOYS WHILE PLAYING: Offers enough space for graffiti and easy viewing, free child’s imagination, provide better preschool or homeschool learning experience!

ROAD TRIP ESSENTIALS KIDS: The case of drawing board for kids is made of durable plastic, add round corner design which has good shock resistance and drops resistance. The colorful etch a sketch weights only 150 grams and has only 1/ 3 inches thickness, suitable for airplane, car activities, travel toys

EASY TO USE: The doodle baord toys creates colorful lines of different thickness, based on how hard you push with stylus, nails, or any hard thing. Press erase button, emptying the screen content takes only one second. Also can use lock key to save the content. It is recommended to use under light, the line will be brighter.

3 4 5 YEAR OLD BOY TOYS: Perfect toys for boys to practice writing and drawing that will keep them entertained. It is dreaming toys that can be handy in the car and useful at home as well. Really useful for growing kids.

GIFTS FOR BOYS 3 4 5 6 7 YEARS OLD: It is perfect kids toys choice as top christmas gifts toys for kids 2022, toddler boys christmas gifts; stocking stuffers; birthday gifts; Thanksgiving gifts; Easter ; Valentines day gifts for kids; Halloween gifts

PACKAGE INCLUDE: Lcd Writing tablet + Pen String + Pen Holder + Drawing pen + Built-in Battery + packaging box. Because the extra battery and screwdriver are too small, in case for kids accidentally eating, the product will not be equipped with extra battery and small screwdriver. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for Younger Children
reviews.reviewText: I have bought two of these for grandchildren. It is very durable and easy for even toddlers to use. Colors are vibrant, lines are clear. Attatched nib is wonderful - no pen loss. Designed very well. Travels fantastic. Children of all ages love it. Hope they don’t ‘improve’ it. Its fine the way it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Introducing the 10 Inch Colorful Toddler Doodle Board Drawing Tablet! Let your little one's creativity run wild with this fun and interactive writing tablet. Encourage them to explore their artistic talents and express themselves in a colorful and engaging way. The durable design and easy-to-use features make it perfect for little hands. It's a great way to keep your child entertained while also fostering their imagination and fine motor skills. Get ready for hours of creative fun with this awesome drawing tablet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend if you had toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3.5-year-old daughter to play with. I liked it because it was compact and there was no mess. I have 4 of them now. I have 1 in my and my husband's cars and two at home. These are great for car rides with toddlers vs giving them a tablet. It's great to throw in your bag and bring to a restaurant. My daughter is now 5 and still loves playing with this. It's a great alternative to coloring books and markers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very simple; very good
reviews.reviewText: I love this little thing. It's really just a simple doodling toy for a young kid. But as an adult, I use it at my desk all the time. I historically waste a ton of post-its and little pieces of note paper, writing down things I need to do and then tossing the notes. With this "toy", I keep a daily to-do list that is reusable essentially indefinitely. It's easier and cheaper than using my phone, an iPad, etc. It would be great to be able to erase one or two items and keep others... but this is a $10 toy. I just cross things off the list, then eventually erase the whole thing and start over. It's really a great and kind of silly and kind of fun and super simple and super cheap business solution for me. Would anyone else use it like this? I have no clue. But it's great for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doodle or Scribble without wasting paper
reviews.reviewText: My toddler grandson enjoys this reasonably priced writing tablet tremendously! It is small, colorful, and easy to handle. The pin is securely attached, so it doesn’t get lost. Writing or drawings can be erased with the touch of a button. Write, draw, color, erase, begin again. Endless fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good tablet for drawing or writing
reviews.reviewText: This little tablet exceeded my expectations! It's very light weight and so far seems pretty durable. It's good for doodling or practicing letters and numbers. The lock feature keeps drawings in place and the little button erases quickly and thoroughly. Be sure to connect the pen to the tablet with the stretchy cord so the pen doesn't get lost. This was a good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet for our kids and we use for our business for notes and draw out ideas.
reviews.reviewText: Handy tablet that is great for our family and business. It's perfect for our 2-year-old, as well as for my husband and myself. Unfortunately, we lost the pen that came with it due to our toddler's curiosity. However, we can still use our finger or a plastic pen without an ink tip, and it works just as well."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Learning Tool for Creative Kids!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the KOKODI LCD Writing Tablet for my 4-year-old, and it has quickly become one of her favorite toys. This tablet is not only entertaining but also quite educational. The 10-inch colorful screen is captivating for young children and provides a fantastic canvas for their artistic endeavors.Pros:Educational Fun: I love that my child is able to express her creativity while also improving her fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. The tablet offers a mess-free way for her to draw, doodle, and practice writing her letters and numbers.Reusable and Erasable: The erasable feature is a game-changer. My little one can experiment and learn without wasting paper or creating a mess. The erase button is intuitive and easy for her to use independently.Portable and Durable: The tablet's size is perfect for on-the-go entertainment. It's slim, lightweight, and the stylus is tethered, so I don't have to worry about losing it. The build feels sturdy enough to withstand toddler handling.Battery Life: We've been using the tablet for a few weeks now, and the battery seems to last forever. It's a relief not to have to constantly change batteries or worry about recharging.Cons:Limited Color Variety: While the colorful screen is engaging, I wish there were more color options available. This could make the drawing experience even more exciting for kids.Pressure Sensitivity: The tablet doesn't have pressure sensitivity levels like some other digital drawing tools. While this might not be a major issue for toddlers, it could enhance the experience for older kids.Overall, the KOKODI LCD Writing Tablet is a fantastic addition to our collection of educational toys. It's a wonderful way for my child to learn, play, and unleash her creativity without the mess of traditional art supplies. With a few minor improvements, like more color choices and perhaps some advanced features for older kids, this could easily be a 5-star product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Item is awesome and the price was really good
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loved this he is always saying nan can I have paper to draw so with this item he can draw and erase quite easy. The features of being really colourful is a bonus as well, quite pleased with the item and the price.

It is simple, works well, the colors are appealing to the child, it saves paper, and the little cord that attaches the pen to the tablet is just the right length. It was our lowest priced gift from the ones we purchased yet it’s the one kids were drawn to.
My son loves to draw on this
It is so much fun to play with this no age limit good for every one and good quality

It saves so much paper which kids waste a lot.I got it for my three year old grandson and he loves it. Before he was wasting lots of paper everyday. Now he can learn to write or draw as much as he can. It is very light and sleek. How far it will hold only time will tell. But you can’t go wrong with the price and the utility of it. Thanks.
